channel.title: Black Mesa Surface Tension 2 HECU Delta Get Down Mix
channel.description:
Presenting ...
[url='https://soundcloud.com/lumbergh_1/black-mesa-surface-tension-2']![](upload://eOKaSM3AeZnX2k2Q2CpkI0c4jbD.jpeg)[/url]
[click banner ^ to go to SoundCloud]
[b]What[/b]
A humorous remix of Black Mesa's 'Surface Tension 2' track, where HECU marines and other Black Mesa characters narrate the proceedings.
[b]Why[/b]
When I was approaching the cliffs for the first time in-game via the tunnel where the jets go by in Surface Tension, nearby marines started randomly speaking in sequence to the music of 'Surface Tension 2' for a few moments. After that I knew this had to happen, just more cohesively. :wink:
[b]How[/b]
All source material is taken from Black Mesa and its derivative sources (Half Life, Half Life 2). In other words, all material is 'authentic.' I adapted existing work, but I didn't create anything that wasn't already there. All I did was modulate the voice audio in places and mix it in, and I remastered the track afterward. I didn't change the music at all outside the remaster.
[b]Legal[/b]
I make no ownership claims to any of this material. All source materials are the property of the Black Mesa Development and team and their respective owners.
[b]Permissions[/b]
Feel free to use this however you want, non-commercially. Just don't make any ownership claims that I haven't made and don't say you created it (unless you add to it or make a video or something).
Enjoy.
